radiographic_examinations.findings: Successful cannulation of the common bile duct with complete opacification of the CBD and right and left hepatic ducts. A rounded filling defect within the lower end of CBD was noted, where a 6-mm stone was extracted during a balloon sweep. Two other filling defects in the right hepatic duct likely represent air bubbles.
Cholelithiasis and CBD enlargement with mild GB wall thickening. Inflammation at head of pancreas. Duodenal diverticulum.
